cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.recipe: Muddle mint and sugar. Add lime juice and rum, fill with crushed ice. Stir, top up with soda water, and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.recipe: Stir gin and vermouth with ice, strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with an olive or lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.recipe: Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a salt-rimmed glass filled with ice, and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.recipe: Muddle sugar, bitters, and water. Add bourbon and stir. Pour over a large ice cube in a rocks glass, and garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.recipe: Shake rum, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe glass, and garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.recipe: Shake whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white (if using) with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice, and garnish with a cherry and lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.recipe: Stir gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice, and garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.recipe: Stir bourbon, sweet vermouth, and bitters with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe glass, and garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.recipe: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice, top with cola, and garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.recipe: Shake vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.recipe: Blend rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass, and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.recipe: Shake all ingredients (except dark rum) with ice. Strain into a glass filled with crushed ice, float dark rum on top, and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a sprig of mint.

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.recipe: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice, top with soda water, and garnish with a lemon wheel and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.recipe: Shake vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, salt, and pepper with ice. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice, and garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.recipe: Muddle mint leaves, sugar, and water in a glass. Add crushed ice and bourbon, stir well, and garnish with a sprig of mint.

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.recipe: Shake gin, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe glass, and garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver
cocktails.recipe: Pour vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well, and garnish with an orange wheel.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.recipe: Pour tequila and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well, and slowly pour grenadine over the back of a spoon to create a sunrise effect. Garnish with an orange wheel and a cherry.

cocktails.name: White Russian
cocktails.recipe: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur into a rocks glass filled with ice. Float cream on top by slowly pouring it over the back of a spoon. Stir before drinking.

cocktails.name: Bramble
cocktails.recipe: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice, drizzle crème de mûre over the top, and garnish with a blackberry and a lemon wheel.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.recipe: Pour vodka and lime juice into a copper mug filled with ice. Top with ginger beer, stir gently, and garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktails.recipe: Pour Prosecco, Aperol, and soda water into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently, and garnish with an orange wheel.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.recipe: Shake cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a sugar-rimmed coupe glass, and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.recipe: Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a rocks glass. Fill with crushed ice, add cachaça, and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.recipe: Shake vodka, coffee liqueur, and espresso with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with coffee beans.
